p: The novel virus was initially termed as “2019 novel coronavirus” (2019-nCoV) and, subsequently, as “Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus type 2” (SARS-CoV-2). It was first isolated on 7 January 2020. Since then, the virus has spread worldwide, reaching, as of 25 April 2020, 210 countries and infecting more than 3,000,000 patients globally, causing 200,000 deaths.
